title: Help Bug Splat
body: Game keeps Bug splatting after champion select I'm able to select my champion the countdown will finish then I get a black screen and bug splat every time. I tried repairing didn't work, tried uninstalling and reinstalling didn't work, so I have no idea what's going on this is really getting annoying. I don't know if its because I'm using my tv as a monitor but it shouldn't be cause I was able to do it before please help.

replies.body: You may have a driver or hardware issue that's preventing league from rendering properly.  Go over every step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out possibilities and get this fixed.  Let me know if you have any questions.
